senses.ex: She has been working here for over a decade.

Tips.title: Measuring Time
Tips.description: Use 'decade' to mark significant time periods in history or someone's life.
Tips.example: The technological advances this last decade have been remarkable.

Tips.title: Not Always Exact
Tips.description: 'Decade' may refer to an approximate span of ten years, not exactly ten.
Tips.example: The band's music shaped a generation, roughly a decade of influence.

Tips.title: Cultural Milestones
Tips.description: Use 'decade' when discussing periods known for specific cultural trends.
Tips.example: The fashion trends of the 80s decade were truly unique.

senses.de: In reference to each of the ten parts into which a century is divided
senses.ex: The first decade of the 21st century

Tips.title: Historical Segments
Tips.description: 'Decade' helps divide centuries into more manageable and referable parts.
Tips.example: The fifth decade of the 19th century was turbulent with many revolutions.

Tips.title: Century Context
Tips.description: Mention the century to clarify which 'decade' you're referring to.
Tips.example: During the seventh decade of the 20th century, many countries became independent.

senses.de: A set of ten, particularly in art or entertainment
senses.ex: This album is a decade of his greatest hits.

Tips.title: Collective Works
Tips.description: In art and music, 'decade' can mean a collection of ten works or highlights.
Tips.example: The painter's exhibit featured a decade of her best landscapes.

Tips.title: Entertainment Series
Tips.description: Series or sets often use 'decade' to indicate a collection of ten items.
Tips.example: The special edition box set includes a decade of award-winning films.

senses.de: A decade refers to a person's age in the tens, for example, someone in their 20s or 30s

Tips.title: Age Milestones
Tips.description: 'Decade' can describe distinct life stages marked by age.
Tips.example: Entering a new decade of life, she felt more confident than ever.

Tips.title: Life Chapters
Tips.description: A 'decade' metaphorically implies a new chapter in a person's life story.
Tips.example: He approached his fourth decade with a fresh perspective.

Decagon.wordDefinition:
Decade refers to a period of ten years, while decagon refers to a shape with ten sides. Decade is used to talk about time, such as the 1980s being a decade of excess.

Decagon would be applicable when talking about geometry, specifically a polygon with ten sides.

quotes.Text: Real change, the kind we have not seen in decades, is only going to come from outside the system. And it's only going to come from a man who's spent his entire life doing what others said could not be done. My father is a fighter.
quotes.Title: American Businesswoman
quotes.Name: Ivanka Trump

quotes.Text: The action we take and the decisions we make in this decade will have consequences far into this century. If America shows weakness and uncertainty, the world will drift toward tragedy. That will not happen on my watch.
quotes.Title: American President
quotes.Name: George W. Bush

quotes.Text: Dread, which is closely related to fear, steals the ability to enjoy ordinary life and makes people anxious about the future. It keeps them from looking forward to the next day, the next month, or the next decade.
quotes.Title: American Author
quotes.Name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.Text: In energy, you have to plan and do research way in advance, sometimes decades in advance to get a new system that's safer, doesn't require us to go around the world to get all our oil.
quotes.Title: American Businessman
quotes.Name: Bill Gates

quotes.Text: Having worked with many of the world's top modeling agencies for the last decade, I've seen what works and doesn't work in managing a model's career.
quotes.Title: Canadian Model
quotes.Name: Coco Rocha

quotes.Text: Much of the social history of the Western world, over the past three decades, has been a history of replacing what worked with what sounded good.
quotes.Title: American Economist
quotes.Name: Thomas Sowell

quotes.Text: I've said it for four decades - work 'on' your business, not just 'in' your business!
quotes.Title: American Writer
quotes.Name: Michael Gerber

quotes.Text: I've got huge affection for Everton. It was my life for over a decade.
quotes.Title: Scottish Coach
quotes.Name: David Moyes

quotes.Text: I've aged. 'Patagonia' has robbed me of a decade of my life.
quotes.Title: Welsh Actor
quotes.Name: Matthew Rhys

quotes.Text: I didn't wear jeans for, like, a decade of my life.
quotes.Title: American Actress
quotes.Name: Melissa McCarthy
